title: Massive Amazon sale: the 11 best deals on tablets, Echo, Kindle, Ring and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score epic deals from Amazon's epic device sale
article: We're rounding up the 11 best deals from today's massive Amazon sale which include record-low prices on tablets, the Echo Show, Kindle, the 4K Fire TV Stick, Ring Doorbells, and more.

Some highlighted offers from the Amazon sale include the Kindle e-reader on sale for a record-low price of just $59.99 (was $89.99), a $10 discount on the best-selling 4K Fire TV Stick, and the Echo Show 5 marked down to an all-time low price of $44.99 (was $89.99). If you're looking for tablet deals, you can snag the all-new Fire HD 10 tablet on sale for a record-low price of $99 (was $149.99) and a $40 discount on the Fire 7 Kids Pro tablet. See more of the best Amazon device deals below, and keep in mind, these are limited-time offers, and you might not see record-low prices like this until the upcoming 2021 Black Friday deals event.

Shop more offers with our roundup of the best Amazon Kindle sales and see more of the best cheap Fire Tablet deals that are happening now. You can also look forward to upcoming offers during the 2021 Black Friday deals event and see more of the best Amazon deals.
